Keybind.TeleportTokensHint: Teleport selected tokens to mouse cursor position

Settings.ModeHint: Set the teleporter mode: Off (disabled), Slow (click while holding key), or Fast (immediate)
Settings.SnapToGridHint: Snap the teleported tokens to the nearest grid square center

Notifications.ModeSlow: Teleporter set to Slow Mode (hold key + click)
Notifications.SlowModeInstruction: Hold the teleport key and click where you want to teleport

Warnings.GMOnly: Only GMs can use the teleporter
Warnings.NotEnabled: Teleporter is not enabled. Click the teleporter button in the token controls to enable it.

Errors.TeleportFailed: Teleportation failed. Check console for details.
